dmca.title: Don't Mess with Dancing Hamsters
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: 


I am the creator of the Hampster Dance. You have reproduced my copyrighted page without my permission at http://greymatter.org/satanichamsterdance/. My site is a childsafe page and your associating the Hampster Dance is not appreciated. Remove your page at once. I have CC'd my lawyer and Business Manger on this matter also. 


[Name] CEO Inner Child Productions, Inc.
